title: What happened a lot longer ago than it seems? - Quora

response.answer_text: Gore warning, sorry!!(just blood) when i was 7 years old (little baby kate owo) my father was cutting a ziptie with a real sharp knife ( idk why tho..I have asked him many times..) when low and behold he had a knife, in his arm…he was in shock blood was everywhere and my distinct high pitched cracking voice calls down to my brother “DAD STABBED HIMSELF GET UPSTAIRS RIGHT FREAKNG NOW!!!!!!” my brother didn’t believe me at first uuuuntill i told him to get hiss a- upstairs. (Yep..got in trouble for that one.) and when my dad came back from the er, he continued to cut the ziptie.. now I can still see and remember everything like it was last week…
